sentences.english: You can also create ringtones out of songs you downloaded.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以将你下载的歌曲制作成手机铃声。

sentences.english: Two men are chopping away at a log of wood with regular, ringing blows.
sentences.chinese: 两个伐木工人看着一棵树，带着有规律的铃声。

sentences.english: He was started out of his horrible dream by my ringing.
sentences.chinese: 我给他打电话的铃声，使他从噩梦中惊醒过来。

sentences.english: Through the grass came a soft silvery tinkling.
sentences.chinese: 从草海中传来了一阵微弱的银叮铃声。

sentences.english: An unreinforced response is when the bell goes on but there's no food.
sentences.chinese: 非强化反应是有铃声但却没食物的时候。

sentences.english: The bell tinkled as he opened the shop door.
sentences.chinese: 他打开商店门时铃声叮当响起。

sentences.english: The bell for the end of first period rang then.
sentences.chinese: 第一节课结束的铃声响了。

sentences.english: The teacher went into classroom, taking some books in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 上课铃声一响，老师就抱着书走进了教室。

sentences.english: Make sure the ringtone is no more than 40 seconds long.
The bell rang and out rushed the children.
All the students run out of the classrooms as soon as the bell rings.
sentences.chinese: 铃声一响，学生们都从教室里跑出来。

sentences.english: Download cool ringtones, wallpapers, videos, or games.
sentences.chinese: 下载酷铃声，壁纸，视频或游戏。

sentences.english: The telephone kept ringing until I answered it.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃声一直响着，直到我去接才停。

sentences.english: Later the bell ran hard from the bedroom .
sentences.chinese: 后来卧室里又响起了震耳的铃声。

sentences.english: They are personalised ringtones that you can download to your mobile phone.
sentences.chinese: 他们是个人铃声，你可以下载到手机。
右键选择铃声，点击“删除”。

definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
